publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1731 John Swinney: The Draft Transport and Works (Scotland) Act 2007 (Access to Land by the Scottish Ministers) Order 2008—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee recommends that the draft Transport and Works (Scotland) Act 2007 (Access to Land by the Scottish Ministers) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Jim Mather*

S3M-1731 John Swinney: The Draft Transport and Works (Scotland) Act 2007 (Access to Land by the Scottish Ministers) Order 2008—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee recommends that the draft Transport and Works (Scotland) Act 2007 (Access to Land by the Scottish Ministers) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Jim Mather
